title: The Ichor of Faerie: Stories from the Hollow Grove
description: Come little mortal, let us take you away...The Fae realm is a beautiful but dangerous place, with creatures and beings just as likely to kill you than kiss you. Those who wander there must keep their wits about them.In these tantalizing tales, explore magic and mayhem as Charlotte Townsend and Mana Sol take you to a realm beyond imagination, with inhabitants you'll never forget.
author: Mana Sol
